title: FARM SCHOOL: How to Do Sucessfully Farming In Africa "Simple Techniques"

tasks.task: Subscribe to or interact with a farming information channel.
subtasks: Watch Lubaba TV episodes in English.
Like and subscribe to the channel's YouTube page.
Click the notification bell to stay updated.

tasks.task: Invest in agriculture regardless of geographical location.
subtasks: Evaluate personal interest and capability for farming.
Research the type of farming desired using online resources.
Learn about the entire process of a specific crop (e.g., maize).
Identify knowledgeable people to manage the farm when absent.
Choose experienced and skilled farm experts and equipment.
Adhere to good agricultural practices (e.g., timely planting, fertilization).
Plan and secure market for the agricultural products.
